channel.title: Abnib Birthdays
channel.description: Birthdays and other special events of Abnibbers, their partners, and their children

item.title: Ruth's 41st birthday is in 7 days
item.description: It's on Sunday 26 October 2025. On WhatsApp? Send greetings via Dan or JTA.
item.abnib:longdesc: Ruth's 41st birthday is on Sunday 26 October 2025.

item.title: Fiona & Kit's 21st wedding anniversary is today
item.description: It's on Thursday 23 October 2025. On WhatsApp? Send greetings via Kit.
item.abnib:longdesc: Fiona & Kit's 21st wedding anniversary is on Thursday 23 October 2025.
